title: An Interview with Pat Vines
creator_credit: Pat Vines and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: Pat Vines joined the Australian Navy as a nurse during World War II. She moved up the ranks and eventually became a Commander. Pat tells her story through her memories of wartime and what it was like to work in the Navy.
description: Pat Vines joined the Australian Navy as a nurse during World War II. She moved up the ranks and eventually became a Commander. Pat tells her story through her memories of wartime and what it was like to work in the Navy.
